Title: Matthew 5:6
Plot: The Caffee's Sunday dinner is interrupted by  Treasury Agents looking for the conterfeit money.  Michael takes care of the guy who "ratted" him out and Tommy looks to the speaker for help on a bill that will help his real estate deal.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Robert Mason,  Scottie Thompson,  Lewis D Wheeler,  Julie  McNiven,  Armen Garo,  Gary Galone,  Anthony  Estrella
